## How to test
1. Run `mkdocs build`
2. Run `mkdocs serve` and verify pages locally (http://localhost:8000/)
3. Check relevant links and nav entries in `mkdocs.yml`

## Checklist
- [ ] `mkdocs build` succeeds
- [ ] `mkdocs serve` verified in browser
- [ ] Updated `Date` metadata for edited job/policy files
- [ ] Updated `mkdocs.yml` nav if adding/removing files
- [ ] PR title uses format: `docs(jobs): add job-support-<slug> for <role>` (or `docs(...)` per change)
- [ ] `./up.sh` used if you want an interactive commit/push helper (optional)
- [ ] Copilot instructions (`.github/copilot-instructions.md`) updated if the change affects workflows or conventions
